subject: p11378150
History: Evaluation of the patient after left thoracotomy and left upper lobectomy for lung cancer, assessment after chest tube discontinuation.
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to. Heart size and mediastinum are stable in appearance including left mediastinal shift, expected. No evidence of pneumothorax or interval increase of pleural effusion is demonstrated. Post-sternotomy wires appear unchanged including two upper broken wires. The chronic interstitial changes are unchanged as well.
